law.text:
Any subject person is a principal who:
Commits an offense punishable by this code, or aids, abets, counsels, commands, or procures its commission; or
Causes an act to be done which if directly performed by the person would be punishable by this code.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 81, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 87, effective July 1, 1954.
